org.apache.sshd.common.config.keys

Interface PublicKeyEntryDecoder<PUB extends PublicKey,PRV extends PrivateKey>

  • Type Parameters:
    PUB - Type of PublicKey
    PRV - Type of PrivateKey
    All Superinterfaces:
    PublicKeyEntryResolver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPublicKeyEntryDecoder, DSSPublicKeyEntryDecoder, ECDSAPublicKeyEntryDecoder, RSAPublicKeyDecoder

    public interface PublicKeyEntryDecoder<PUB extends PublicKey,PRV extends PrivateKey>
extends PublicKeyEntryResolver
    Represents a decoder of an OpenSSH encoded key data
    Author:
    Apache MINA SSHD Project

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.sshd.common.config.keys.PublicKeyEntryResolver

        FAILING, IGNORING

    • Method Detail

      • getPublicKeyType

        Class<PUB> getPublicKeyType()
        Returns:
        The Class of the PublicKey that is the result of decoding

      • getPrivateKeyType

        Class<PRV> getPrivateKeyType()
        Returns:
        The Class of the PrivateKey that matches the public one

      • getSupportedTypeNames

        Collection<String> getSupportedTypeNames()
        Returns:
        The Collection of OpenSSH key type names that are supported by this decoder - e.g., ECDSA keys have several curve names. Caveat: this collection may be un-modifiable...

      • generateKeyPair

        KeyPair generateKeyPair(int keySize)
                 throws GeneralSecurityException
        Parameters:
        keySize - Key size in bits
        Returns:
        A KeyPair with the specified key size
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - if unable to generate the pair

      • cloneKeyPair

        KeyPair cloneKeyPair(KeyPair kp)
              throws GeneralSecurityException
        Parameters:
        kp - The KeyPair to be cloned - ignored if null
        Returns:
        A cloned pair (or null if no original pair)
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If failed to clone - e.g., provided key pair does not contain keys of the expected type
        See Also:
        getPublicKeyType(), getPrivateKeyType()

      • clonePublicKey

        PUB clonePublicKey(PUB key)
            throws GeneralSecurityException
        Parameters:
        key - The PublicKey to clone - ignored if null
        Returns:
        The cloned key (or null if no original key)
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If failed to clone the key

      • clonePrivateKey

        PRV clonePrivateKey(PRV key)
             throws GeneralSecurityException
        Parameters:
        key - The PrivateKey to clone - ignored if null
        Returns:
        The cloned key (or null if no original key)
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If failed to clone the key

      • getKeyPairGenerator

        KeyPairGenerator getKeyPairGenerator()
                              throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns:
        A KeyPairGenerator suitable for this decoder
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If failed to create the generator

      • decodePublicKey

        PUB decodePublicKey(byte... keyData)
             throws IOException,
                    GeneralSecurityException
        Parameters:
        keyData - The key data bytes in OpenSSH format (after BASE64 decoding) - ignored if null/empty
        Returns:
        The decoded PublicKey - or null if no data
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed to decode the key
        GeneralSecurityException - If failed to generate the key

      • decodePublicKey

        PUB decodePublicKey(byte[] keyData,
                    int offset,
                    int length)
             throws IOException,
                    GeneralSecurityException
        Throws:
        IOException
        GeneralSecurityException

      • decodePublicKey

        PUB decodePublicKey(InputStream keyData)
             throws IOException,
                    GeneralSecurityException
        Throws:
        IOException
        GeneralSecurityException

      • encodePublicKey

        String encodePublicKey(OutputStream s,
                       PUB key)
                throws IOException
        Encodes the PublicKey using the OpenSSH format - same one used by the decodePublicKey method(s)
        Parameters:
        s - The OutputStream to write the data to
        key - The PublicKey - may not be null
        Returns:
        The key type value - one of the getSupportedTypeNames()
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed to generate the encoding

      • getKeyFactoryInstance

        KeyFactory getKeyFactoryInstance()
                          throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns:
        A KeyFactory suitable for the specific decoder type
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If failed to create one
